translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Faculties🔽The Triad-Twofold-Conditional Relations Discourse

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽10.13. Sanidassanattika, Cūḷantaraduka🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañcavīsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate pañcavīsa.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika cūḍantara duka  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca pe na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na asaṅkhatam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca  hetuyā pañcavīsa ārammaṇe nava pe avigate pañcavīsa
translated: With-object-support, the Shorter Section on Twos

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca 🔽na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava 🔽na sani dassana sa paṭigham na rūpim dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na arūpim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sani dassana sa paṭigham na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca  na sanidassana sa paṭigham na lokuttaram dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tiṁsa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… aññamaññe pañcavīsa …pe… avigate tiṁsa.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca pe na sanidassana sappaṭigham na na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca 🔽hetuyā tisa ārammaṇe nava pe aññamaññe pañcavīsa pe avigate tisa
